title: Dairy farms in the United States

content.question: A. Identify ONE type of boundary data shown on the map. B. Identify the region of the United States where most dairy farms are located. C. Identify ONE spatial pattern shown on the map. D. Describe the characteristic land use associated with the spatial pattern shown on the map. E. Describe TWO geographic features not shown on the map that would help explain the patterns of dairy farming shown on the map.

frqParts.text: A. Identify ONE type of boundary data shown on the map. B. Identify the region of the United States where most dairy farms are located. C. Identify ONE spatial pattern shown on the map. D. Describe the characteristic land use associated with the spatial pattern shown on the map. E. skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
